mapper.select: SELECT name, Floor(m.price / 100 * (100 - m.sale)) as price, b.date FROM movie m, buy_movie_list b WHERE b.movie_no = m.movie_no AND user_no = #{user_no};
SELECT date FROM buy_movie_list b, movie m WHERE b.movie_no = m.movie_no AND user_no = #{user_no} AND date = #{date} AND Floor(m.price / 100 * (100 - m.sale)) = #{price};
SELECT is_watched FROM buy_movie_list b, movie m WHERE b.movie_no = m.movie_no AND user_no = #{user_no} AND date = #{date} AND Floor(m.price / 100 * (100 - m.sale)) = #{price} AND is_watched = 'N';
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET coin = (#{coin} - #{price}) WHERE user_no = #{user_no};
UPDATE user SET coin = (#{coin} + #{price}) WHERE user_no = #{user_no};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM buy_movie_list WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND date = #{date};
